column5: This is a beautifully furnished home nestled in East Texas on a large ranch. Very private and quite for those who need rest and relaxation. Everything you need for comfort away from home is right here. There are 3 bedrooms and 4 full baths. There are many things to do that is a 45 minute drive or less. *Notice-This house is not located at the lake. Cedar Creek lake is 20 minutes but there is a small private lake on the property. 10 miles from Athens and 15 miles from Malakoff. 45 min from Canton.
